text: When the mandatory field "responseMessage" is missing in the result csv, the report generation should display a clear error message instead of java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
creator: benoit.wiart@gmail.com
f.sabbe@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Created attachment 33513
Error message improvement

This patch allow to display which required CSV column is missing.

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
